title: QSPR and q-RASPR predictions of the adsorption capacity of polyethylene, polypropylene and polystyrene microplastics for various organic pollutants in diverse aqueous environments
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00311J, Paper
Md Mobarak Hossain, Arkaprava Banerjee, Mainak Chatterjee, Kunal Roy, M. T. Cronin
Microplastics (MPs) and nanoplastics (NPs) have become significant environmental concerns due to their widespread presence in various ecosystems and their potential to act as carriers and accumulators of organic pollutants,...
